mapper.update: update T_CON_ContractChangeSettleBill set FSTATE='1SAVED',FSOURCEFUNCTION=null where fid=#{easid}
mapper.select:
select bill.fid as id,bill.FSTATE as state,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FNAME as title, con.FNUMBER as contractNumber,con.FNAME as contractName, con.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount,con.FAMOUNT as amount, pro.FNAME_L2 as projectName,bill.FREPORTAMOUNT as reprortAmount, bill.FALLOWAMOUNT as allowAmount,bill.FCHANGERESON as changeReason, u.FNAME_L2 as auditorName,bill.FAUDITTIME auditTime,bill.FCREATETIME as createTime, bill.FLASTAMOUNT as lastAmount from T_CON_ContractChangeSettleBill bill left join T_CON_CONTRACTBILL con on con.fid=bill.FCONTRACTBILLID left join T_FDC_CURPROJECT pro on pro.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_PM_User u on u.fid=bill.FAUDITORID
and bill.FCONTROLUNITID=#{orgId}
and bill.FCurProjectID in
#{item}
and bill.fname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and bill.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and bill.fstate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{state}),'%')
and pro.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{projectName}),'%')
and con.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractNumber}),'%')
and con.FNAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractName}),'%')
order by bill.FBOOKEDDATE desc,bill.fnumber

select bill.fid as id,bill.FSTATE as state,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FNAME as title, con.FNUMBER as contractNumber,con.FNAME as contractName,bill.FLASTAMOUNT as lastAmount, con.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount,con.FAMOUNT as amount,bill.FCOLSEDESCRIPTION closeDescription, pro.FNAME_L2 as projectName,bill.FREPORTAMOUNT as reportAmount,bill.FSOURCEFUNCTION as sourceFunction, bill.FALLOWAMOUNT as allowAmount,en.FCHANGECONTENT as executeContent, u.FNAME_L2 as auditorName,u1.FNAME_L2 as creatorName,bill.FAUDITTIME auditTime,bill.FCREATETIME as createTime, cb.FORIGINALAMOUNT as calOriAmount,cb.FAMOUNT as calAmount,sup.FNAME_L2 as supplierName,bill.FISFINISH as isFinish, bill.FISFEE as isFee,bill.FWXCB as wxcb,bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FCOLSEDESCRIPTION as colseDesc, res.FNAME_L2 as changeReason,type.FNAME_L2 as changeTypeName,cb.FCOSTUNIT as costUnit, cb.FOFFER as offer,cb.FCONDUCTDEPTID,ad.FNAME_L2 as conductDeptName,sup1.FNAME_L2 as conductUnitName, cb.FREADESC as reaDesc,cb.FISFEE as isFee,cb.FIsChangeContract as isChangeContract,cb.FIsReceipts as isReceipts, cb.FISIMPORTCHANGE as isImportChange from T_CON_ContractChangeSettleBill bill left join T_CON_ContractChangeEntry en on en.FPARENTID=bill.FCONCHANGEBILLID left join T_CON_CONTRACTBILL con on con.fid=bill.FCONTRACTBILLID left join T_FDC_CURPROJECT pro on pro.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_PM_User u on u.fid=bill.FAUDITORID left join T_PM_User u1 on u1.fid=bill.FCREATORID left join T_CON_ContractChangeBill cb on cb.fid=bill.FCONCHANGEBILLID left join T_BD_Supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FSUPPLIERID left join T_FDC_CHANGEREASON res on res.fid=cb.FCHANGEREASONID left join T_FDC_CHANGETYPE type on type.fid=cb.FCHANGETYPEID left join T_ORG_Admin ad on ad.fid=cb.FCONDUCTDEPTID left join T_BD_Supplier sup1 on sup1.fid=cb.FCONDUCTUNITID where bill.fid=#{id}
select FSRCAMOUNT as srcAmount from T_CON_CONTRACTBILL where FMainContractNumber=#{num}
select FCHANGECONTENT as changeContent,FAMOUNT as amount,FUNIT as unit,FPRONUMBER as proNumber, FREMARK as remark,FTOTALAMOUNT as totalAmount from T_CON_ConChangeSettleEntry where FPARENTID=#{id}
